title: (another) Font I.D.
content:
Does anybody know the typeface that “Jim Shaw” is written in? Thanks

[http://www.esmog.org/bilder/1119574387.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906202214/http:/www.esmog.org/bilder/1119574387.jpg "http://www.esmog.org/bilder/1119574387.jpg")

 [‹ type Id help](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906202214/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46861 "Go to previous forum topic") [Anyone? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906202214/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46917 "Go to next forum topic")
author: j. cullen

comments.content:
To quote myself ;):  
_’Elektrosmog are well known for using/creating custom typography / typefaces for their work. (So that may as well be custom made.) That said, you may find commercially available Esmog types at Lineto.’_

Dav
